title: >>> SLIP-SLIDE Ride
body_text:
Be hard, be tough. The will and heart of dodgeball's elite remains strong.
A Wet War will not, and cannot, discourage those who love this game.
DODGEBALL 72 Records
> Attendance: 22
> Biggest Returns:
Kristen Driscoll (Last appearance at DODGEBALL 23)
Guy Ritt (Last appearance at DODGEBALL 43)
> New Players: (3) Andrew Cangiano, Jason Levy, Pam "D'"
-
Wet War XIII
, the first WW in 4 and 1/2 months.
-
Prison Ball
began by Game 4.
- Alison Bertsch captains record after 72: 1-2-1
- Sara DeCuir tied the "Most Times Captain" list, with a new record of 3-4-0. She and John Tronolone have been captains a total of 7.
- It's a tradition now: Luke brought free pizza yet again.
Titan vs. Titan
A night of unpredictability! The first
Wet War
since DODGEBALL 53 and the inclusion of
Prison Ball
, made this impromtu Female Titans contest a slaughter!
Isn't it interesting how some 50 events after the dreaded DODGEBALL TWENTY-TWO ice war came yet another rainy, but wild evening. And as the past has proven, mother nature has never stopped the warriors of Wall High School.
Though the battle witnessed two of the greatest women one-on-one, perhaps one Kevin Fitzpatrick took center stage. Hydroplaning around the court and the impactful nutshot on Kevin Adams stole the show. Recognized players like Kristen Driscoll, Ryan McCrorey, and Guy Ritt also reappeared, having been absent for sometime.
In the end, the intense Sara DeCuir defeated powerhouse Alison Bertsch in the star-studded main event, 3 - 2.
Alison was victorious in the first two games; Sara took home the final three.
The 13th
Wet War
featured plenty of extras not already mentioned including video footage and the ever-popular "pizza party" thanks to Luke.
________________________________________
____________
Quote
:
"I can honestly say I will long remember this event. It had all the ingredients of a true classic; new players, pizza, and even the rain. On a final note, did anyone see Fitz's bag of goodies?"
-
JOHN TRONOLONE
________________________________________
____________
DODGEBALL 73
January 20
, the one year anniversary of DODGEBALL 23. Last year witnessed players in T-shirts and shorts for the first time in ages. Will the weather hold up in 2007?
**And be sure to check back for information regarding the anticipated tournament in the beginning of February!
body_html:
Be hard, be tough. The will and heart of dodgeball's elite remains strong.
A Wet War will not, and cannot, discourage those who love this game.

DODGEBALL 72 Records
> Attendance: 22
> Biggest Returns:
Kristen Driscoll (Last appearance at DODGEBALL 23)
Guy Ritt (Last appearance at DODGEBALL 43)
> New Players: (3) Andrew Cangiano, Jason Levy, Pam "D'"

- Wet War XIII, the first WW in 4 and 1/2 months.
- Prison Ball began by Game 4.
- Alison Bertsch captains record after 72: 1-2-1
- Sara DeCuir tied the "Most Times Captain" list, with a new record of 3-4-0. She and John Tronolone have been captains a total of 7.
- It's a tradition now: Luke brought free pizza yet again.

Titan vs. Titan
A night of unpredictability! The first Wet War since DODGEBALL 53 and the inclusion of Prison Ball, made this impromtu Female Titans contest a slaughter!

Isn't it interesting how some 50 events after the dreaded DODGEBALL TWENTY-TWO ice war came yet another rainy, but wild evening. And as the past has proven, mother nature has never stopped the warriors of Wall High School.

Though the battle witnessed two of the greatest women one-on-one, perhaps one Kevin Fitzpatrick took center stage. Hydroplaning around the court and the impactful nutshot on Kevin Adams stole the show. Recognized players like Kristen Driscoll, Ryan McCrorey, and Guy Ritt also reappeared, having been absent for sometime.

In the end, the intense Sara DeCuir defeated powerhouse Alison Bertsch in the star-studded main event, 3 - 2.
Alison was victorious in the first two games; Sara took home the final three.

The 13th Wet War featured plenty of extras not already mentioned including video footage and the ever-popular "pizza party" thanks to Luke.


____________________________________________________

Quote:
"I can honestly say I will long remember this event. It had all the ingredients of a true classic; new players, pizza, and even the rain. On a final note, did anyone see Fitz's bag of goodies?"
- JOHN TRONOLONE
____________________________________________________

DODGEBALL 73
January 20, the one year anniversary of DODGEBALL 23. Last year witnessed players in T-shirts and shorts for the first time in ages. Will the weather hold up in 2007?

**And be sure to check back for information regarding the anticipated tournament in the beginning of February!
